short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert the currency of the page to the desired currency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly get prices in your own currency in just a few seconds.

its quite easy just load up your site and you will see the converted price.

if a price was found highlight the text and click on convert and if it can find it again it will change it.


also you can also type in a price in the popup to convert prices.

Thanks for using my extension
